00015 #include "ui_dmmform.h"
00016 #include <QStatusBar>
00017 #include "dmm.h"
00018 #include "interface.h"
00019 #include "analyzer.h"
00020 #include "xnodeconnector.h"
00021 
00022 XDMM::XDMM(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00023            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00024            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00025            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00026            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) : 
00027     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00028     m_entry(create<XScalarEntry>("Value", false, 
00029                                  dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00030     m_function(create<XComboNode>("Function", false)),
00031     m_waitInms(create<XUIntNode>("WaitInms", false)),
00032     m_form(new FrmDMM(g_pFrmMain))
00033 {
00034     scalarentries->insert(m_entry);
00035     m_waitInms->value(100);
00036     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00037     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("DMM - ") + getLabel() );
00038     m_function->setUIEnabled(false);
00039     m_waitInms->setUIEnabled(false);
00040     m_conFunction = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_function, m_form->m_cmbFunction);
00041     m_conWaitInms = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(m_waitInms, m_form->m_numWait);
00042 }
00043 
00044 void
00045 XDMM::showForms() {
00046 //! impliment form->show() here
00047     m_form->show();
00048     m_form->raise();
00049 }
00050 
00051 void
00052 XDMM::start()
00053 {
00054     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XDMM>(shared_from_this(), &XDMM::execute));
00055     m_thread->resume();
00056 
00057     m_function->setUIEnabled(true);
00058     m_waitInms->setUIEnabled(true);
00059 }
00060 void
00061 XDMM::stop()
00062 {
00063     m_function->setUIEnabled(false);
00064     m_waitInms->setUIEnabled(false);
00065 
00066     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00067 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00068 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00069 }
00070 
00071 void
00072 XDMM::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00073 {
00074     double x;
00075     x = pop<double>();
00076     m_value = x;
00077     m_entry->value(x);
00078 }
00079 void
00080 XDMM::visualize()
00081 {
00082     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00083     //! record is read-locked
00084 }
00085 
00086 //! called when m_function is changed
00087 void
00088 XDMM::onFunctionChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node)
00089 {
00090     try {
00091         changeFunction();
00092     }
00093     catch (XKameError &e) {
00094         e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("DMM Error"));
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void *
00099 XDMM::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00100 {
00101     try {
00102         changeFunction();
00103     }
00104     catch (XKameError &e) {
00105         e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("DMM Error"));
00106         afterStop();
00107         return NULL;
00108     }
00109         
00110     m_lsnOnFunctionChanged = 
00111         function()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00112             shared_from_this(), &XDMM::onFunctionChanged);    
00113     while(!terminated)
00114     {
00115         msecsleep(*waitInms());
00116         if(function()->to_str().empty()) continue;
00117       
00118         double x;
00119         XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00120         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00121         try {
00122             x = oneShotRead();
00123         }
00124         catch (XKameError &e) {
00125             e.print(getLabel() + " " + i18n("DMM Read Error"));
00126             continue;
00127         }
00128         clearRaw();
00129         push(x);
00130         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00131     }
00132     
00133     m_lsnOnFunctionChanged.reset();
00134         
00135     afterStop();
00136     return NULL;
00137 }
